subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
introduction: Find answers to common questions about our healthcare recruitment platform.

contactCta.title: Still have questions?
contactCta.description: Our support team is ready to help you with any additional questions.

q1.question: What is InteriMed?
q1.answer: InteriMed is a specialized digital platform that connects healthcare facilities with qualified professionals for temporary and permanent recruitment. Our mission is to simplify the recruitment process in the healthcare sector in Switzerland.

q2.question: In which regions is InteriMed available?
q2.answer: Currently, InteriMed is available throughout French-speaking Switzerland. We plan to expand our services to other regions of Switzerland soon.

q3.question: What types of healthcare facilities can use InteriMed?
q3.answer: InteriMed is designed for all types of healthcare facilities, including pharmacies, medical offices, clinics, and hospitals. Our platform adapts to the specific needs of each type of facility.

q1.question: How does InteriMed verify professionals?
q1.answer: We conduct a thorough verification of all professionals on our platform, including verification of diplomas, reference checks, and validation of professional registration. We ensure that all professionals meet Swiss regulatory requirements.

q2.question: What types of positions can I post?
q2.answer: You can post temporary positions (from a single day to several weeks), part-time positions, and permanent positions. Our platform addresses various recruitment needs, from emergency coverage to long-term hires.

q3.question: How quickly can I find staff for an urgent need?
q3.answer: Many facilities find qualified professionals within 24 hours for urgent needs. The exact timeframe depends on your location, specific requirements, and professionals available in your area.

q4.question: What are the costs for healthcare facilities?
q4.answer: Facilities pay subscription fees based on their level of usage, plus a small transaction commission for each successful placement. Our pricing is transparent, with no hidden fees, and significantly lower than traditional recruitment agencies.

q5.question: How can I define my staffing needs?
q5.answer: In your facility profile, you can easily create job postings by detailing your specific needs. Our interactive calendar allows you to plan your needs in advance or post urgent requests.

q1.question: Is InteriMed only for pharmacists?
q1.answer: No, InteriMed is for all healthcare professionals, including pharmacists, pharmacy assistants, pharmacy technicians, and other healthcare professionals (according to current regulations).

q2.question: How can I set my availability?
q2.answer: In your profile, you can set your general availability (days/hours when you usually work) and also mark specific dates on our calendar function. You can update this information at any time as your schedule changes.

q3.question: How and when am I paid?
q3.answer: Payment terms vary by facility, but our platform handles secure payment processing. Most temporary assignments are paid within 1-2 weeks after completion, while permanent positions follow the facility's normal pay schedule.

q4.question: Do I have to pay to use InteriMed?
q4.answer: Basic profiles for professionals are free. We only charge a small service commission when you successfully obtain a position through our platform.

q5.question: How can I find opportunities that match my skills?
q5.answer: Our intelligent matching system automatically suggests opportunities tailored to your profile, skills, and availability. You can also browse our job marketplace to explore all available opportunities.

q1.question: Is InteriMed compliant with Swiss regulations?
q1.answer: Yes, InteriMed is fully compliant with Swiss employment and data protection regulations. We work closely with legal experts to ensure our platform meets all legal requirements.

q2.question: How does InteriMed handle employment contracts?
q2.answer: InteriMed facilitates the creation of employment contracts that comply with Swiss legislation. Depending on the type of assignment, we offer different contract templates adapted to the specific needs of facilities and professionals.

q3.question: How does InteriMed protect my personal data?
q3.answer: We take personal data protection very seriously. All data is stored on secure servers in Switzerland, in accordance with the Federal Data Protection Act (DPA) and GDPR. We only use your data for the purposes specified in our privacy policy.

q1.question: What are the different subscription plans for facilities?
q1.answer: We offer several subscription plans tailored to the needs of facilities of different sizes. Plans vary based on the number of positions you can post and the advanced features available. Contact us for personalized pricing.

q2.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q2.answer: No, our pricing policy is completely transparent. You only pay the clearly indicated subscription fees and transaction commissions. There are no hidden fees or additional costs.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Subscriptions are generally billed monthly, and you can cancel before the next billing cycle.

q1.question: How can I reset my password?
q1.answer: On the login page, click on 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions to reset your password. A reset link will be sent to your email address.

q2.question: Is InteriMed compatible with all browsers?
q2.answer: InteriMed is optimized for recent versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of your preferred browser.

q3.question: How can I contact technical support?
q3.answer: You can contact our technical support team by email at support@interimed.ai or via the contact form on our website. Our team is available Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm.
